definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: Under sail, the ship's response spectrums are calculated on the irregular waves in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 計算起重船在不規則波中調遷時的運動響應。

sentences.english: We wish to relocate this fund in a foreigner's name to avoid any trace.
sentences.chinese: 我們在外國人的名字希望調遷這筆資金避免所有蹤影。

sentences.english: She should be willing to relocate to the USA.
sentences.chinese: 她應該是願意調遷到美國。
